|brand = Sophos |model = RED |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 15w |revision = Rev. 1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/15/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Sophos_RED_15w_Rev_1 |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = RYK-WPEA-121N |icid = 6158A-WPEA121NW |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 4BQ00REDD1X10 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);P1010; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Power |cpu1_type_rev = QorIQ |cpu1spd = 533 <!-- 533 / 1000MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B1G1646I-BCMA; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211FS; |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367RB; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1A:8C |oui = 00:1A:8C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.0.10;QorIQ-SKD-V1.6; |stockos = Linux;3.10.49;OpenWrt Barrier Breaker;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = metal case, heatsink |addchip = 3A Bus Termination Regulator;Fitipower;FP6137F;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MB3232I;;1;,,, Freescale P10XX System Clock w/Selectable DDR Frequency;Renesas;6V49205B;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 08/31/2023 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = SparkLAN WPEA-121N |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (half) |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9382; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "RED15 VER:D", "4BQ00REDD1X10" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" are silkscreened on both sides of the board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' P1011 [[PowerPC]] (@533MHz) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 128MB NAND Flash *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *WiFi: Atheros AR9382 (802.11abgn) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 1.5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.enterpriseav.com/datasheets/sophosreddsna.pdf Datasheet] * [https://docs.sophos.com/nsg/sophos-red/quickstart/en-us/sophosRED15_50oien.pdf Operating Instructions]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/sophos/sophos_red_15w_rev._1 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = mpc85xx |subtarget = p1010 |arch = powerpc_8540 |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
